title: Best of the Program | Guests: Peter Schweizer & Scott Karns | 1/26/22
description:
Glenn lays out all the ways the government is attempting to take full control over every aspect of our lives. Author Peter Schweizer joins Glenn to discuss his book, “Red-Handed: How American Elites Get Rich Helping China Win." CEO and president of Karns Foods Scott Karns joins Glenn to discuss how grocers are having to manage both inflation and supply chain issues.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
